content: सैंधव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सिंधुनदसिमीपे देशे भवः अण्] {@--1@} Produced or born in the Sindhu-territory. {@--2@} Belonging to the Indus. {@--3@} River-born. {@--4@} Belonging to the sea, oceanic, marine. --वः {@--1@} A horse, especially one bred in {%Sindhu%}; <ls>N. 1. 71.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a sage. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country. --वः , --वं A kind of rock-salt. --वाः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab> The people inhabiting the {%Sindhu%} territory.
